meanings.definition: The state or quality of being sticky or adhesive.
meanings.sent1: The glueynesses of the tape made it perfect for sticking things together.
meanings.sent2: The honey's glueynesses made it hard to remove from the jar.
meanings.sent3: The glueynesses of the gum caused a funny situation when it stuck to his nose.
meanings.sent4: The glueynesses of the spider's web trapped unsuspecting insects.
meanings.sent5: The glueynesses of the slime were so strong, it could hold small objects in place.

meanings.definition: The property of being thick or viscous.
meanings.sent1: The glueynesses of the pudding made it difficult to pour smoothly.
meanings.sent2: The glueynesses of the mud made it hard for the hikers to walk through.
meanings.sent3: The glueynesses of the syrup made breakfast extra messy.
meanings.sent4: The glueynesses of the paint made it challenging to spread evenly.
meanings.sent5: The glueynesses of the lava flowed slowly down the volcano's slopes.

meanings.definition: The characteristic of being difficult to separate or break apart.
meanings.sent1: The glueynesses of the relationship between the two friends kept them close.
meanings.sent2: The glueynesses of the knots in the rope made untying them a real challenge.
meanings.sent3: The glueynesses of the puzzle pieces made it hard to fit them together.
meanings.sent4: The glueynesses of the bond between the siblings was unbreakable.
meanings.sent5: The glueynesses of the Velcro ensured a secure fastening.
